diagnostic analytics which answers the question why did it happen so perhaps my sales for last month was quite low
because the specific store didn't perform in in as expected and then we go
into the realm of predictive analytics what what will happen in the future what will my sales be in the next month or
the next quarter and finally we have prescriptive analytics which meet which tries to ask the question or answer the
question how can we make it happen like what are the certain steps that we can take in order to actually increase
sales for next quarter now you can imagine as the value of these analytics
